title: Kylie Jenner and Tyga party at the same nightclub after denying ‘date’
text:
Kylie and Tyga coincidentally ended up at the same Hollywood club (Picture: Mega)

Kylie Jenner was spotted arriving at the same nightclub where her ex Tyga was also partying last night, days after she denied having a late night meeting with him last week.

The 22-year-old beauty mogul was seen arriving at Hyde club in West Hollywood at around 1am on Sunday morning, after travelling on a party bus with her older sister Khloe Kardashian.

Trailed by her entourage, Kylie held onto her bodyguard’s shoulders and seemed to be in high spirits as she exited the bus, clearly living her best, newly-single life.

Tyga, 29, wasn’t part of the group and was already inside the club with his own set of friends when Kylie arrived. It’s not known if they had any contact with each other inside the club.

As if that wasn’t enough of a coincidence, Khloe’s ex-husband Lamar Odom also partied at the club with his girlfriend Sabrina Parr.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It comes after the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star was forced to deny meeting up with her ex-boyfriend at a recording studio on Wednesday.

Photos appeared to show Kylie arriving at the Sunset Marquis recording studio at around 3am with her friends Anastasia “Stassi” Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine.

Kylie pulled up in a party bus (Picture: MEGA)

Tyga wasn’t part of Kylie’s group (Picture: MEGA)

The rapper was already inside the club when Kylie arrived (Picture: MEGA)

But according to Kylie, she only dropped her pals off and didn’t see Tyga inside.

Responding to the claims, Kylie said in a series of tweets: ‘The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

‘Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority [sic].’

The reality TV star dated Taste rapper Tyga for three years between 2014 and 2017 but they split shortly before she began dating Travis.

Kylie was said to have arrived at around 1am (Picture: Backgrid)

The reality star was joined by a group of friends including sister Khloe Kardashian (Picture: Backgrid)

News of Kylie and Travis’ split emerged earlier in the week when TMZ reported they were ‘taking a break’ but amicably co-parenting their one-year-old daughter Stormi.

Travis, 28, was later alleged to have had a ‘side chick’ with claims he had been cheating on Kylie with model Yungsweetro.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The model, real name Rojean Kar, was pictured with Travis back in 2013 but internet sleuths claim to have noticed that she had shared photos in the same locations Travis was in immediately after his own photos.

But the SICKOMODE rapper denied cheating on Kylie and said in an Instagram story: ‘It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again.

‘Once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real [sic].’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Kylie Jenner was spotted arriving at the same nightclub where her ex-boyfriend Tyga was partying, following her split from Travis Scott.
